title: Embossed Velveteen & Gilded, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: cut floats of supplementary weft in plain weve foundation (velveteen), then printed with gilt paint.
provenance: ex. coll. Antonio Vivés y Escudero
description: Sprays of flowers in gold on maroon.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embossed Velveteen & Gilded, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: cut floats of supplementary weft in plain weve foundation (velveteen), then printed with gilt paint.. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-798.
